about_the_game:
You had plans for a cozy Autumn potluck until a storm destroyed your one place to gather! Find your friends in the aftermath so that you might get everyone together once again. Gather resources using different tools and chat with your friends to get gameplay hints in this cozy 2D life sim. Do it right and you'll be throwing your seasonal dinner party in no time!

Explore the world

Find your friends

Chat with them

Gather resources

Customize your outfit

Characters include:
  • Jules
  • Mae
  • Lani
  • Quincy
  • Jaden

Tasks include:
  • Pruning pumpkins
  • Collecting corn
  • Picking apples
  • Chopping wood
  • Mining stone

Outfit includes:
  • Hat
  • Jacket
  • Jeans
  • Boots
detailed_description:
You had plans for a cozy Autumn potluck until a storm destroyed your one place to gather! Find your friends in the aftermath so that you might get everyone together once again. Gather resources using different tools and chat with your friends to get gameplay hints in this cozy 2D life sim. Do it right and you'll be throwing your seasonal dinner party in no time!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Any modern dual-core processor, such as Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or a dedicated GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or later
  • Processor: A faster dual-core or quad-core processor, like Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU with 1GB or more of VRAM for improved performance and graphical quality
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card

name: Autumn's Bounty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core processor (e.g., Intel Core i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card or dedicated graphics card with at least 256 MB VRAM (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 156 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later, macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Quad-core processor (e.g., Intel Core i5 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with at least 1 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Find your friends, save your potluck.
